text:
The purposes of this Chapter are to implement the provisions of Section 
D3.750-4 of the San Francisco Charter, to establish procedures for the processing of appeals to the Building Inspection Commission, and to provide that appeals heard by the former Abatement Appeals Board shall be heard by the Building Inspection Commission. 
(Added by Ord. 160-99, File No. 990798, App. 6/11/99)
